patterns: List of places near nuware eliya
What can I see around nuwara eliya?
responses: There are many locations to visit around Nuwara Eliya. Like the Lake Gregory, Victoria park, Lover's leap waterfall, Moon plains, Hortan plains, etc.

patterns: What can I see around anuradhapura?

patterns: What can I see around Polonnaruwa?
responses: There are many locations to visit around Polonnaruwa. Like Gal viharaya, Parakrama samudraya, Minneriya national park, etc..
